properties.name: gl.logger.traced.enabled
properties.description:
Enables the Tracing processor for the aspect.
Default: true

properties.name: gl.logger.timed.enabled
properties.description:
Enables the Timing processor for the aspect.
Default: true

properties.name: gl.logger.parameter.enabled
properties.description:
Enables the Loggable annotation to be processed.
Default: true

properties.name: gl.logger.registry.jmx
properties.description:
Enables the JMX Registry for Micrometer.
Default: true

properties.name: gl.logger.strings.parameter.method
properties.description:
Changes the text shown for @Loggable for the methods.
Default: Parameters for {}

properties.name: gl.logger.strings.parameter.exception
properties.description:
Changes the text shown for @Loggable for the exceptions.
Default: Excption at {}: {}

properties.name: gl.logger.strings.parameter.parameter-value
properties.description:
Changes the text shown for @Loggable for the parameter values.
Default: -> {}

properties.name: gl.logger.strings.parameter.return-value
properties.description:
Changes the text shown for @Loggable for the return values.
Default: Returning Value {}: {}
